item.title: Lecturas compartidas el 18 de julio de 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
Las lecturas compartidas en Mastodon el 18 de julio de 2024 son

  • Lecturas compartidas el 16 de julio de 2024. #ITP #Lean4 #Coq #LLMs #Programming #Emacs
  • Functional Pearl: Short and mechanized logical relation for dependent type theories. ~ Yiyun Liu, Stephanie Weirich. #ITP #Coq
  • HHLPar: Automated theorem prover for parallel hybrid communicating sequential processes. ~ Xiangyu Jin, Bohua Zhan, Shuling Wang, Naijun Zhan. #ITP #IsabelleHOL
  • Molly: A verified compiler for cryptographic roles. ~ Daniel J. Dougherty, Joshua D. Guttman. #ITP #Coq
  • Formalizing operads for a categorical framework of DSL composition. ~ Zachary Flores, Angelo Taranto, Yakir Forman, Eric Bond. #ITP #Coq
  • Modular implementation and formalization of dynamic policies (Work in progress). ~ Antonio Zegarelli, Niki Vazou, Marco Guarnieri. #FunctionalProgramming #LiquidHaskell
  • Demystifying Artificial Intelligence (Symbolic, data-driven, statistical and ethical AI). ~ Emmanuel Gillain (ed.). #eBook #AI
  • Using ChatGPT as a proof assistant in a mathematics pathways course. ~ Hyejin Park, Eric D. Manley. #ChatGPT #Math #Reasoning
  • The Haskell Unfolder Episode 29: Exceptions, annotations and backtraces. ~ Edsko de Vries (@EdskoDeVries), Andres Löh (@kosmikus@functional.cafe). #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming

item.title: Lecturas compartidas el 14 de mayo de 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
Las lecturas compartidas en Mastodon el 14 de mayo de 2024 son

  • #Calculemus: Demostraciones con Lean4 e Isabelle/HOL de "Si G es un grupo y a, b ∈ G, entonces (ab)⁻¹ = b⁻¹a⁻¹". #ITP #Lean4 #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • #Exercitium: Matrices de Toepliz. #Haskell #Python #Matemáticas
  • Schönhage-Strassen multiplication (in Isabelle/HOL). ~ Jakob Schulz. #ITP #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • An entry into the world of Org Mode for non Emacs users. ~ James Stoup. #Emacs #OrgMode
  • Writing Lisp code with ChatGPT. #Elisp #ChatGPT
